appName: Grip Jump VR: Surviving & Climbing Game
displayName: Grip Jump VR: Surviving & Climbing Game
display_name: Grip Jump VR: Surviving & Climbing Game
display_long_description:
Welcome to Grip Jump VR, the ultimate vertical challenge where precision, timing, and nerves of steel decide your fate. In this first-person VR climbing adventure, you'll leap between towering skyscrapers using only your hands—and a rapidly disappearing series of ladder steps.

Each move is a test of skill. Reach out, grab, hang, and swing to the next step. Sounds simple? Think again. Every ladder step appears and disappears on a timer, pushing your reflexes and reaction time to the limit. Miss a grab, hesitate too long, or lose your grip—and it's a long fall back to the streets below.

Designed exclusively for VR, Grip Jump VR gives you full control over your movement using intuitive hand-tracked or controller-based climbing mechanics. You'll physically reach, grip, and climb your way through increasingly challenging environments, each with dynamic lighting, shifting weather, and pulse-pounding heights.

This is more than just a climb—it’s a race against time, gravity, and your own limits.

Key Features
Intuitive hand-tracked or controller-based climbing mechanics.
Disappearing ladder steps add time-based challenge and tension.
Dynamic rooftop levels with increasing difficulty and variety.
Immersive visuals and sound effects heighten the sense of height.
Quick restart system for non-stop action and fast retries.
Built for addictive replayability and skill-based progression.
Perfect for fans of climbing, action, and arcade VR games.
